query:
SELECT o.id, o.name, o.stage, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notes WHERE opportunityId = o.id) as note_count
FROM opportunities o 
WHERE o.name LIKE '%built with%' OR o.name LIKE '%Deal%'
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2SEDxyrr1FpTuCb.3f60e8c25fc3 --database BMkvRPynGy4odLDciqESQg --execute 
SELECT o.id, o.name, o.stage, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notes WHERE opportunityId = o.id) as note_count
FROM opportunities o 
WHERE o.name LIKE '%built with%' OR o.name LIKE '%Deal%'
LIMIT 5;
